Alex Sanders’ portfolio.

Music, design & advanced front-end engineering.

tl;dr

I have been building websites professionally since 1998. I have released records as a member of Transept. I have a degree in Philosophy, and a research masters in Electroacoustic Composition and Sound Art.

University of East Anglia

MMus (by research) Electroacoustic Composition and Sound Art

10/2004—10/2006

Awarded a distinction.

My composition for twelve airhorns—Airhorns—opened the inaugural Faster Than Sound festival at Bentwaters airbase in Suffolk.

I also designed a poster and signage for a performance we organised by composer Tony Conrad.

Ableton Live, Protools, Pd, Max/MSP.

University College London

BA (Hons) Philosophy (2:1)

09/1995—06/1998

I specialised in Plato, aesthetics and 17th-18th century European philosophy.

I also created the department’s—and my—first website.

Books, Pens, HTML, Photoshop.
